text: Héctor Enrique Arce Zaconeta is a Bolivian lawyer, politician, and was the Solicitor General () of Bolivia. He served as a Member of the Plurinational Legislative Assembly from 2010 to 2014, representing La Paz for the Movement for Socialismhttp://www.procuraduria.gob.bo/index.php/en/?id=114http://www.vicepresidencia.gob.bo/spip.php?page=parlamentario&id;_parlamentario=15 Arce served as the President of the Chamber of Deputies from January 2010 to January 2012. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:People from La Paz Category:Higher University of San Andrés alumni Category:Bolivian socialists Category:Movement for Socialism (Bolivia) politicians Category:Presidents of the Bolivian Chamber of Deputies
title: Héctor Enrique Arcé Zaconeta
